title: Create community platform with user interactions

requirements.text: Create a user profile system where community members can view and edit their own profiles with username, bio, and avatar
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create and update their profile information
Profile displays username, bio, and avatar image
Users can only edit their own profiles

requirements.text: Implement a post creation and feed system where users can create text posts and view a chronological feed of all community posts
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create new text posts with content
All posts display in a feed sorted by most recent first
Each post shows the author's username and timestamp

requirements.text: Add interaction features allowing users to like posts and view like counts
acceptanceCriteria: Like count displays on each post
Users cannot like their own posts multiple times

requirements.text: Create a commenting system where users can add comments to posts and view all comments on each post
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add text comments to any post
Comments display under their respective posts
Each comment shows the commenter's username and timestamp

requirements.text: Design a vibrant, modern community-focused interface with a warm color palette (coral, teal, amber accents), friendly rounded typography, and card-based layouts that encourage social interaction and content discovery
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design uses warm, inviting colors that avoid blue and purple
Interface elements use consistent rounded corners and friendly spacing
Layout facilitates easy browsing and interaction with community content

requirements.text: Display generated community platform images including a hero banner and community icon as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Hero banner image displays prominently on the main page
Community icon appears in appropriate locations throughout the interface

required: Vibrant community platform hero banner with diverse people connecting and sharing, using warm coral and teal color scheme with friendly illustrated style (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Simple friendly community icon showing people gathering in a circular formation, warm colors, minimalist style (community-icon.dim_128x128.png)
